intro: Heeria nigricans, commonly known as blackleaf heeria, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenia plants. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks. Heeria nigricans is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
